resources.string: KidsBook is application which help a kids to learn about different countries across the world, apart from it different zoo animal as well as alphabet too.If you have any query or question regarding information in application please mail us on below email address.

Your privacy always important to us.\n This privacy policy statement describes the information practices of KidsBooks and its affiliates.We are not sharing any data to any organization. All of data within application are collected from internet and different organization which may have false information. In such a case you can mail us so we can correct out collected information. All of the content we used within application are collected from below organization. We really thanks to such great organizations.
